name: Hard Rock Casino Northern Indiana
source_detail: Indiana Gaming Commission monthly Excel reports (in.gov/igc), files: in_2022_01 through in_2022_12_revenue.xlsx
verification_notes: 12 monthly source Excel files available but have messy formatting; slots+tables=total check passes; state total $2.50B confirmed via web search. Monthly Excel files contain per-casino Table Win + Slot Win in WAGERING TAX section (rows 37-50). Format differs: 9 cols (Jan-Apr) vs 6 cols (May-Dec). Hard Rock splits into A+B rows. Indiana Grand = Horseshoe Indianapolis (renamed). Automated sum not computed due to format issues.
